problem.markdown:
>>Which three columns are typically found in a calendar table?<<
[ ] Time [x] Date [x] Month [x] Year
[explanation] Time column is not typically found in a calendar table. [explanation]
problem.p: Which three columns are typically found in a calendar table?

checkboxgroup.label: Which three columns are typically found in a calendar table?

div.p: Time column is not typically found in a calendar table.
